dict.string:
Step 1. Create an icon 196x196px and save it to your Camera Roll
Step 2. Locate and move the icon in Filza to /Library/PreferenceBundles/MiniChargeOS.bundle
Step 3. Rename/Delete the original Icon(Watch) and rename your image to 'custom.png'
Step 4. Respring to see your new icon.
Information: - Camera Roll images are located in /var/mobile/Media/DCIM/
